name: analyze_code_snippet
description: Analyze a file or code snippet with SonarQube analyzers to identify code quality and security issues

arguments.name: language
arguments.desc: Language of the code snippet

arguments.name: code_snippet
arguments.desc: Code snippet to analyze

name: analyze_file_list
description: Analyze files in the current working directory using SonarQube for IDE

arguments.name: file_absolute_paths
arguments.desc: List of absolute file paths to analyze

name: toggle_automatic_analysis
description: Enable or disable SonarQube for IDE automatic analysis

arguments.name: enabled
arguments.desc: Enable or disable the automatic analysis

name: search_sonar_issues_in_projects
description: Search for SonarQube issues in my organization's projects

arguments.name: projects
arguments.desc: An optional list of Sonar projects to look in

arguments.name: pullRequestId
arguments.desc: The identifier of the Pull Request to look in

arguments.name: severities
arguments.desc: An optional list of severities to filter by, separated by a comma. Possible values: INFO, LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, BLOCKER

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: An optional page number. Defaults to 1

arguments.name: pageSize
arguments.desc: An optional page size. Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 500. Defaults to 100

name: change_sonar_issue_status
description: Change the status of a SonarQube issue

arguments.name: issue_key
arguments.desc: Key of the issue to modify

arguments.name: transition
arguments.desc: Transition to apply to the issue

name: search_my_sonarqube_projects
description: Find SonarQube projects. The response is paginated

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: An optional page number. Defaults to 1

name: list_quality_gates
description: List all quality gates in my SonarQube

name: get_project_quality_gate_status
description: Get the quality gate status for a project

arguments.name: analysisId
arguments.desc: The optional analysis ID to get the status for

arguments.name: branch
arguments.desc: The optional branch key to get the status for

arguments.name: projectId
arguments.desc: The optional project ID

arguments.name: projectKey
arguments.desc: The optional project key to get the status for

arguments.name: pullRequest
arguments.desc: The optional pull request ID to get the status for

name: show_rule
description: Shows detailed information about a SonarQube rule

arguments.name: key
arguments.desc: Rule key

name: list_rule_repositories
description: List rule repositories available in SonarQube

arguments.name: language
arguments.desc: Optional language key to filter repositories

arguments.name: q
arguments.desc: Optional search query to filter repositories by name or key

name: list_languages
description: List all programming languages supported in this SonarQube instance

arguments.name: q
arguments.desc: Optional pattern to match language keys/names against

name: get_component_measures
description: Get SonarQube measures for a project, such as ncloc, complexity, violations, coverage, etc

arguments.name: projectKey
arguments.desc: The project key

arguments.name: branch
arguments.desc: The branch to analyze for measures

arguments.name: metricKeys
arguments.desc: The metric keys to retrieve

arguments.name: pullRequest
arguments.desc: The pull request identifier to analyze for measures

name: search_metrics
description: Search for SonarQube metrics

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: 1-based page number (default: 1)

arguments.name: pageSize
arguments.desc: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 500 (default: 100)

name: get_raw_source
description: Get source code as raw text from SonarQube. Require 'See Source Code' permission on file

arguments.name: key
arguments.desc: File key

arguments.name: branch
arguments.desc: Branch key

arguments.name: pullRequest
arguments.desc: Pull request id

name: get_scm_info
description: Get SCM information of SonarQube source files. Require See Source Code permission on file's project

arguments.name: key
arguments.desc: File key

arguments.name: commitsByLine
arguments.desc: Group lines by SCM commit if value is false, else display commits for each line

arguments.name: from
arguments.desc: First line to return. Starts at 1

arguments.name: to
arguments.desc: Last line to return (inclusive)

name: get_system_health
description: Get the health status of SonarQube Server instance. Returns GREEN, YELLOW, or RED

name: get_system_status
description: Get state information about SonarQube Server. Returns status, version, and id

name: get_system_logs
description: Get SonarQube Server system logs in plain-text format. Requires system administration permission

arguments.name: name
arguments.desc: Name of the logs to get. Possible values: access, app, ce, deprecation, es, web. Default: app

name: ping_system
description: Ping the SonarQube Server system to check if it's alive. Returns 'pong' as plain text

name: get_system_info
description: Get detailed information about SonarQube Server system configuration including JVM state, database, search indexes, and settings. Requires 'Administer' permissions

name: create_webhook
description: Create a new webhook for the SonarQube organization or project. Requires 'Administer' permission

arguments.name: name
arguments.desc: Name of the webhook

arguments.name: url
arguments.desc: Server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload

arguments.name: project
arguments.desc: The key of the project that will own the webhook

arguments.name: secret
arguments.desc: If provided, secret will be used as the key to generate the HMAC hex digest value

name: list_webhooks
description: List all webhooks for the SonarQube organization or project. Requires 'Administer' permission

arguments.name: project
arguments.desc: Optional project key to list project-specific webhooks

name: list_portfolios
description: List portfolios available in SonarQube with filtering and pagination options

arguments.name: enterpriseId
arguments.desc: Enterprise uuid (SonarQube Cloud only)

arguments.name: q
arguments.desc: Search query to filter portfolios by name

arguments.name: favorite
arguments.desc: If true, only returns favorite portfolios

arguments.name: draft
arguments.desc: If true, only returns drafts created by the logged-in user (SonarQube Cloud only)

arguments.name: pageIndex
arguments.desc: Index of the page to fetch (default: 1)

arguments.name: pageSize
arguments.desc: Size of the page to fetch

name: list_enterprises
description: List the enterprises available in SonarQube Cloud that you have access to

arguments.name: enterpriseKey
arguments.desc: Optional enterprise key to filter results

name: search_dependency_risks
description: Search for software composition analysis issues (dependency risks) of a SonarQube project

arguments.name: projectKey
arguments.desc: Project key

arguments.name: branchKey
arguments.desc: The branch key

arguments.name: pullRequestKey
arguments.desc: The pull request key
